Name: Ramalinga Reddy
Tweet: #BTMLayout Assembly Constituency, Congress MLA Candidate Ramalinga Reddy will be filing nomination papers on 20th April , for 2018 Karanataka Assembly Elections in Koramangala BBMP Revenue Office, after performing pooja at Ganapati Temple, Lakkasandra.   All are welcome.  https://t.co/rnGVn8WHG2
